maqras.text: geudeul juwileul doneun cheongsunhan sonyeondeul-eul neohuiga bolini neohuineun geudeul-i ppulyeonon jinjudeulcheoleom saeng-gaghalila
neohuiga geugos-eul bol ttae neohuineun geugos-eseo chugboggwa widaehan wang-gug-eul moggyeoghalila
geudeul-eun chologsaeg myeongjuwa dukkeo un geumsillo jjan myeongjuleul geolchigo eunpal jjilo jangsig-eul hago iss-eumyeo junim-eun geudeullo hayeogeum seongseuleoun eumlyosuleul masige hadeola
sillo igeos-i neohuileul wihan bo sang-eulo neohuiui nolyeog-eun icheoleom bo sangdoenila
hananim-i geudaeege dangyejeog-eu lo kkulan-eul gyesihaessnola
junim-ui myeonglyeong-e innaehago joe indeul-ina eunhyeleul moleuneun jadeul-ege gwileul giul-ijimalmyeo
achim jeonyeog-eulo junim-eul yeom-won hago
bamjung-eneun geubunkke buboghayeo gyeongbaehamyeo gin bam-eul tonghayeo geubun-eul yeong-gwangdoege hala
sillo ideul-eun jamsi jinaganeun hyeonseleul salanghal ppun gotongseuleoul eo neu nal-eun soholhi hal ppun-ila
hananim-i geudeul-eul changjohago ganghage hayeoss-euna hananim-i wonhal ttae geudeul-eul wanjeonhi daechehal su issnola
sillo igeos-i hanaui gyohun-i geoneul wonhaneun ja nugudeunji junim-eu lo ileuneun gil-eul ttaleudolog hala
neohuiga wonhaneun geos hananim-ui heolag-eobs-ineun ani doenani sillo hananim-eun asimgwa jihyelo chungmanhasinila
hananim-eun geubun-i wonhaneun ja leul geubun-ui eunhyesog-e deulge hasina saaghan jadeul-eul wihaeseoneun gotongseuleo un eungbeol-eul junbihasyeossnola
yeon-ieo bonaeneun balam-eul dugo maengsehasa
bunnohan pogpung-uleul dugo maengseha myeo
meolli guleum-eul naleuneun geudeul-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
seololeul gyeoglisikyeo juneun jadeul-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
gyesileul jeonhayeo juneun jadeul-eul dugo maengsehanani
jinlileul balghigo gyeong-gohanola
sillo neohuiege yagsogdoen geosdeul-idagaogo issnola
byeoldeul-i bich-eul sangsilhago
haneul-i jjogaeeo jimyeo
sandeul-i meonjiga doeeo hwinallyeo gago
seonjijadeul-i yagsogdoen sigan-e moige doeneun ttae
igeosdeul-eun eotteon nal-eul wihayeo yuyedoeeossdeonyo
bunlyuhaneun geunal-eul wihaeseola
bunlyuhaneun geunal-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
hananim-i geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a yes seonjodeul-eul myeolmangke hago
geudeul hue saeloun sedaeleul odolog hage haess-euni
icheoleom hananim-eun joeindeul-eul dalunila
geunal jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul-e ge jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
hananim-i neohuileul changjohamae hachanh-eun jeong-aeg-eulo changjohaji anihaess deonyo
hananim-eun geu jeong-aeg-eul anjeonhan gos-e dueoss-eudoe
allyeojin gigankkajila
hananim-eun geuleohge hayeo hyeongsang eul gyeoljeonghani gajang aleumdaun neunglyeog isila
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
hananim-i geu daejileul moineun gos-eulo haji anihaessneunyo
ineun sanjawa jug-eun jadeul-eul wihaeseola
geu an-e nop-eun sandeul-eul dueo neohuiege masil dalkomhan mul-eul juji anh-assdeonyo
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
neohuiga geojis-ila haessdeon geugos eulo galaneun mal-i iss-eul geos-imyeo
se gallaeui yeongiga ssain geugos-eulo gala
geugos-eun siwonhage hal geuneuldo hwayeom-eul mag-eul geos-i eobsneun gos-ila
sillo gung-gwilgwa gat-eun keugiui bulgil-i chisos-euni
geu bulgil-eun nolan nagtaga ttwineungeosgwa gatnola
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
geunal-eun geudeul-i eotteon maldo halsu eobsneun nal-i doel geos-imyeo
geudeul-egeneun eotteohan byeonmyeongdo heolagdoeji anihani
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
geunal-eun bunlyuleul haneun nal-i doel geos-imyeo hananim-eun neohui moduwa neo hui ijeon-ui modeun jadeul-eul hamkke moi ge halini
neohuiga gyelyag-ina eummohan geos i issdamyeon na-e daehanghayeo eummoha yeo bola
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun siwon han geuneulgwa umul gaunde issge doel geos-imyeo
geudeul-eun gwasildeulgwa geudeul-i won haneun modeun geos-eul gajge doel geos-ila
neohuineun gikkeoi meoggo masila ineun neohuiga haenghan uiloum ttaemun-ila
ileohdeus hananim-eun seon-eul silcheon haneun jadeul-ege bosang-eul hanila
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulini
omanhan jadeul-iyeo neohuido meog go masila geuleona sungan-e bulgwaha nani ineun neohuiga joeindeul-igi ttae mun-ila
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
buboghayeo gyeongbaehala geudeul-egemalsseum-i iss-eoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun geuleohge haji ani haess-euni
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
i mal ihue geudeul-eun eotteon mesejileul mid-eulyeo haneunyo
